sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a719fe61538f2210631d5ef0a0490e05
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_user">employee_numberISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="employee_number" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Leave Bucket</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr=new GlideRecord('x_1647033_lms_leave_calculator');
	gr.addQuery('country.name',current.location.country);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next())
	{
		if(gr.leave_assignment=='y')
		{

			var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
			var currentMonth = gdt.getMonthLocalTime()-1;
			var monthsLeft = 12 - currentMonth;
			var perMonth = gr.leaves / 12;
			var totalLeaves = perMonth * monthsLeft;


			var leaveBucket = new GlideRecord('x_1647033_lms_leave_bucket');
			leaveBucket.initialize();
			leaveBucket.leave_type=gr.leave_type;
			leaveBucket.accrued=totalLeaves;
			leaveBucket.balance=totalLeaves;
			leaveBucket.taken=0;
			leaveBucket.employee=current.sys_id;
			leaveBucket.insert();
		}
		else if(gr.leave_assignment=='m')
		{
			var perMonthM=gr.leaves / 12;

			var leaveBucketM = new GlideRecord('x_1647033_lms_leave_bucket');
			leaveBucketM.initialize();
			leaveBucketM.leave_type=gr.leave_type;
			leaveBucketM.accrued=perMonthM;
			leaveBucketM.balance=perMonthM;
			leaveBucketM.taken=0;
			leaveBucketM.employee=current.sys_id;
			leaveBucketM.insert();	
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-30 05:50:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a719fe61538f2210631d5ef0a0490e05</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Leave Bucket</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1647033_lms">f66e842d53032210631d5ef0a0490e70</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">f66e842d53032210631d5ef0a0490e70</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a719fe61538f2210631d5ef0a0490e05</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-30 06:12:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a719fe61538f2210631d5ef0a0490e05"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8257cb2553cf2210631d5ef0a0490eab
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1647033_lms.lmsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>lmsAjax</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var lmsAjax = Class.create();
lmsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getDateDiff : function()
	{
		var d1=new GlideDate();
		d1.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));
		var d2=new GlideDate();
		d2.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));
		var duration = GlideDate.subtract(d1,d2);
		return duration.getNumericValue();
	},

	getLeaveBucket : function()
	{
		var gr=new GlideRecord('x_1647033_lms_leave_bucket');
		gr.addQuery('employee',this.getParameter('sysparm_user'));
		gr.addQuery('leave_type',this.getParameter('sysparm_leavetype'));
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
		{
			var leaveDetails = {};
			leaveDetails.accrued=''+gr.accrued;
			leaveDetails.balance=''+gr.balance;
			leaveDetails.taken = ''+gr.taken;
			return JSON.stringify(leaveDetails);
		}
		return JSON.stringify({ accrued: '0', balance: '0', taken: '0' });
	},


    type: 'lmsAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-30 06:29:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>8257cb2553cf2210631d5ef0a0490eab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>lmsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1647033_lms">f66e842d53032210631d5ef0a0490e70</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">f66e842d53032210631d5ef0a0490e70</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8257cb2553cf2210631d5ef0a0490eab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-30 10:10:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1647033_lms_leave_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1647033_lms_leave_request">approval=approved^status=submitted^EQ<item display_value="Approved" endquery="false" field="approval" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="approved"/><item display_value="Submitted" endquery="false" field="status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="submitted"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate Leaves</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gr=new GlideRecord('x_1647033_lms_leave_bucket');
	gr.addQuery('employee',current.requested_by);
	gr.addQuery('leave_type',current.leave_type);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next())
	{
		gr.balance=gr.balance-current.duration;
		gr.taken=gr.taken+current.duration;
		gr.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-30 10:22:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f59db7e953c36210631d5ef0a0490e80</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Leaves</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1647033_lms">f66e842d53032210631d5ef0a0490e70</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">f66e842d53032210631d5ef0a0490e70</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f59db7e953c36210631d5ef0a0490e80</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-30 10:22:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f59db7e953c36210631d5ef0a0490e80"/></record_update>
